Mountaineer

Let's Go Mountaineers!

I graduated from WVU in 2019 with a degree in Electrical Engineering and another in Computer Engineering.

Engineer

Engineering is my jam! And it's also my profession.

More than a job

I love learning about technology and applying what I know to build new things. Right now I do that as an Electrical Engineer, focusing on hardware design. But, there's never enough time in the day to finish all of my pet projects!

Explorer

I love travelling and backpacking. I'm probably planning my next adventure right now.

Where to next?
